thread.title: New Year's Eve 2017 live ball drop: How to watch live stream online from Times Square
thread.title_full: New Year's Eve 2017 live ball drop: How to watch live stream online from Times Square

author: Jessica Remo | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: New Year's Eve 2017 live ball drop: How to watch live stream online from Times Square
text: Watch the ball drop and catch all the festivities live from Times Square on New Year's Eve 2017 (12/31/2016) as the countdown to a new year begins Saturday. The live Times Square ball drop stream is free online and also works on your mobile device.
